properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_IMG, MEM_NICK, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_GENDER, MEM_INTRO, TO_CHAR(MEM_SIGN_UP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MEM_SIGN_UP_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PW = ? AND MEM_ESCAPE = 'N'
INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)

UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NICK = ?, MEMBER_TEL = ?, MEMBER_ADDR = ?
WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_ESCAPE = 'Y' WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND MEM_PW = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICK = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDR, TO_CHAR( ENROLL_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"' ) AS ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NICK FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO
UPDATE MEMBER SET PROFILE_IMG = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE CERTIFICATION SET C_NUMBER = ?, ISSUE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE EMAIL = ?

SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT '1' FROM CERTIFICATION WHERE EMAIL = ? AND C_NUMBER = ?) = 1
THEN NVL( (SELECT '1' FROM CERTIFICATION WHERE EMAIL = ? AND ISSUE_DT + (INTERVAL '5' MINUTE) >= SYSDATE) , '2')
ELSE '3' END FROM DUAL
